Text:
Hi Abraham,
Praise God. Thanks for the great uploads! Do you have a version of THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING without the Portuguese audio overlay? Or is there anyway to limit the audio to English? Contact me at shimrana@aggressivechristianity.net  Downloaded it but couldn't watch it because of the Portuguese audio. Hope you can help. Keep up the good CHRISTIAN movie uploads. 
Peter

@shimrana i have already posted the movie its in dual language(English & Portuguese) u can play it using VLC player just selct track2 from audio option in the menu bar
